channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tricky brainteaser with hidden message leaves many baffled - only 1% can solve it
item.description: The image, which at first glance appears to be a collection of three-dimensional shapes, has been baffling social media users ever since it was shared...

item.title: Urgent Quality Street recall - fears life-like Christmas baubles could be eaten
item.description: John Lewis has recalled a range of glass baubles amid concerns shoppers might tuck into the treat as they mistake them for the real thing

item.title: Marks and Spencer introduces self-checkouts in unlikely new 'stupid' place in 'major' store revamp
item.description: Marks and Spencer has announced plans to introduce self checkouts in a rather unlikley place in its stores in a bid to speed up the process and make i...

item.title: Woman finds strange metal rod baked into her Pizza Hut takeaway
item.description: The fast food giant refused to give her a refund.

item.title: Teen kicked out of foster home sent desperate message to social worker - 'you abandoned me'
item.description: Duncan Langley told his story to the Mirror after charity Become released research showing young people who have been in care are nine times more like...

item.title: Mystery footprints appear at coffee shop ‘haunted by soldier from 1800s’
item.description: 'Within the first week of the shop, I kept hearing the sound of rustling noises in the office.'

item.title: Bat Beauty Contest Sees 1 Winged Contestant That'd Be 'Perfect' For Quidditch
item.description: The contest coincides with the start of Bat Week, during which bat experts hold educational events celebrating the only flying mammal.

item.title: Urgent warning UK tourists and expats in Spain will be 'forced to leave'
